duties_responsibilities.duty: Leading security diligence for acquisitions and designing security roadmaps.
Improving subsidiary security at a company-wide scale through innovative security solutions.
Communicating effectively at multiple levels of management and engineering, building trust across the organization.
Identifying opportunities to improve, build, or acquire security tooling, processes, and procedures.
Performing threat modeling and turning it into actionable plans to reduce risk.

education_certification.credential: BA/BS in computer science, information security, related discipline, or equivalent work experience
